abstract: Reader comments on my column about the Nuba Mountains and the American aid worker who stayed there to bear witness.
snippet: Reader comments on my column about the Nuba Mountains and the American aid worker who stayed there to bear witness.
lead_paragraph: My Sunday column is about Ryan Boyette, an American aid worker who stayed behind in the Nuba Mountains of Sudan to bear witness to atrocities there, when virtually everyone else evacuated. I thought you might like to take a look at Ryan, so here are a couple of photographs.

headline.main: The Man Who Stayed Behind (in Sudan)
